name: minions-social-accounts-workspace
description: Account definitions, platforms, namespaces/purposes, and API keys
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/cli run build && pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/docs run build && pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/blog run build && pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-social-accounts/cli run lint
